titleStmt.title: Ground of natural philosophy divided into thirteen parts : with an appendix containing five parts / written by the ... Dvchess of Newcastle.
titleStmt.author: Newcastle, Margaret Cavendish, Duchess of, 1624?-1674.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, much altered from the first which went under the name of Philosophical and Physical opinions.
